useCase.name: Modify Metadata of Deposited Item

preconditions.precondition: Researcher is logged in and authenticated in the EDRMS System.
Researcher has navigated to "My Deposited Items" section.

successEndConditions.condition: Researcher successfully edits the metadata of the selected item.

useCase.trigger: User selects an item to edit from the deposited items list.

mainSequence.step: Researcher logs in to the EDRMS System.
Researcher authenticates in the EDRMS System.
Researcher selects an item to edit.
Researcher edits the metadata of the selected item.
